issue.title: www.hellomarket.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.hellomarket.com/search?q=%EC%94%BD%ED%81%AC%ED%8C%A8%EB%93%9C+%EB%85%B8%ED%8A%B8%EB%B6%81](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.hellomarket.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3D%25EC%2594%25BD%25ED%2581%25AC%25ED%258C%25A8%25EB%2593%259C%2B%25EB%2585%25B8%25ED%258A%25B8%25EB%25B6%2581) ### Comment Username: @bokkwonsu > 헬로마켓 웹사이트에서 상품 검색이 왜 안되는지 그 이유를 찾았습니다. > > 구글 크롬 브라우저에 'AdGuard'라는 광고 차단 확정프로그램을 설치하여 사용하는데 광고 차단을 활성화하면 상품 검색 시에 결과가 노출되지 않고, 광고 차단을 비활성화하면 상품 검색 시에 결과가 노출됩니다. > > 'AdGuard'라는 광고 차단 확정프로그램을 설치하셔서 다시한번 재확인 부탁드리고, 광고가 아닌 상품 검색결과가 차단되는 것은 필터 문제인거 같아 'AdGuard' 측에 필터 수정을 요청하셔야 될거 같습니다 > > https://adguard.com/ko/ ### Screenshots

- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

AdGuard for Windows

7.10.2

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

Chrome

Desktop

https://www.youtube.com/c/iXBTgames/about

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Russian filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.hellomarket.com/search?q=%EC%94%BD%ED%81%AC%ED%8C%A8%EB%93%9C+%EB%85%B8%ED%8A%B8%EB%B6%81](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.hellomarket.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3D%25EC%2594%25BD%25ED%2581%25AC%25ED%258C%25A8%25EB%2593%259C%2B%25EB%2585%25B8%25ED%258A%25B8%25EB%25B6%2581) ### Comment Username: @bokkwonsu > 헬로마켓 웹사이트에서 상품 검색이 왜 안되는지 그 이유를 찾았습니다. > > 구글 크롬 브라우저에 'AdGuard'라는 광고 차단 확정프로그램을 설치하여 사용하는데 광고 차단을 활성화하면 상품 검색 시에 결과가 노출되지 않고, 광고 차단을 비활성화하면 상품 검색 시에 결과가 노출됩니다. > > 'AdGuard'라는 광고 차단 확정프로그램을 설치하셔서 다시한번 재확인 부탁드리고, 광고가 아닌 상품 검색결과가 차단되는 것은 필터 문제인거 같아 'AdGuard' 측에 필터 수정을 요청하셔야 될거 같습니다 > > https://adguard.com/ko/ ### Screenshots

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
I tried to reinstall the certificate but it doesn't solve the problem.

However, after further testing, I found out the problem was using Local HTTP Proxy and my VPN provider (only on some geographic servers; I tested SG, NL, and JP servers; only SG servers have the problem). Using AdGuard's Local VPN mode and SG servers also solved the problem (I use WireGuard kernel mode so I can use two VPN providers at the same time).

I wonder why though because it used to work fine until a few weeks ago.

comment.body:
These possible rewrite to `upward`?

```
forum.mobilism.me#?##pagecontent > table.tablebg > tbody > tr[class^="row"] > td.profile td.postdetails:contains(The Advertiser):upward(tr[class^="row"])
```

If run with AdGuard environment then possible try add second as vanilla CSS with `[style*="display: none !important;"]`.

As fallback if bug survive in stable 105 and no possible fast repair procedural filtering.

comment.body:
I guess that something doesn't work correctly.
Could you please try to reinstall AdGuard's certificate? - https://kb.adguard.com/en/android/overview#install-certificate
You can also try to change `Filtering method` to `Local VPN` (`AdGuard -> Settings -> Network -> Filtering method - Local VPN`), at least temporary.

If it will not help, then I think that it would be a good idea to contact with technical support - https://kb.adguard.com/en/technical-support

comment.body:
Не повторяется с вашими настройками.
Попробуйте выключить и снова включить контент-блокеры в настройках Сафари, а также обновить фильтры Адгарда.
Важно не закрывать окно Адгарда при обновлении фильтров в течение ~60 секунд, иначе iOS прервёт процесс применения фильтров.

### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.title: Google Play: com.mobilityware.solitaire

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mobilityware.solitaire](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fplay.google.com%2Fstore%2Fapps%2Fdetails%3Fid%3Dcom.mobilityware.solitaire) ### Comment > Jedes Mal, wenn man im Spiel neuen Deal oder neuen Gewinner Deal oder auch tägliche Herausforderung klickt, wird zunächst ein werbescreen geöffnet. Wenn Edgard eingreift, ist dieser werbescreen komplett schwarz bis auf ein X oben rechts. Wenn Edgar nicht eingreift gibt es unterschiedliche regionale Werbung, ein Beispiel habe ich beigefügt. Manchmal blendet die App aber auch nur eine Eigenwerbung für ein anderes Spiel derselben Firma ein Punkt auch davon habe ich einen Screenshot beigefügt. Der Bildschirm wird jedes Mal komplett ausgefüllt, es gibt also keine langen Screenshots zu senden. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/dWBqhNW.jpg)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/zrY4vxv.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | Android Huawei Emui 12.0.0 AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Android v3.6.9 AdGuard mode: | proxy Filtering quality: | High-quality HTTPS filtering: | disabled Stealth mode: | disabled DNS filtering: | server: `Adguard DNS`
Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base Userscripts: | disabled

comment.body: Hello, I am replying to you using a translator, the attached address is the VOD address of the live streaming site in Korea. (The main address is https://www.afreecatv.com) I deleted the video number after the address and asked, so I don't think you can play it with that address. If you are not a Korean, you can use a translator and enter VOD replay?, and the phenomenon I inquired about usually occurs once an hour while watching VOD, and infinite loading occurs for 5 to 10 minutes. If you want to check the problem, it will take a lot of time, so we will wait for Koreans to solve the problem.

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
This issue has been escalated to [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra):
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra/issues/348

Please wait until it is solved there.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, you’re probably already using AdGuard Extra so you just need to wait until it is updated.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

This issue has been escalated to [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra):
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra/issues/348

Please wait until it is solved there.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, you’re probably already using AdGuard Extra so you just need to wait until it is updated.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

This issue has been escalated to [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra):
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra/issues/348

Please wait until it is solved there.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, you’re probably already using AdGuard Extra so you just need to wait until it is updated.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.body:
This issue has been escalated to [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra):
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra/issues/348

Please wait until it is solved there.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, you’re probably already using AdGuard Extra so you just need to wait until it is updated.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

pull_request.title: Fix #127568 www.mcbbs.net
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request > Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\ > If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\ > It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/en/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\ > Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it ## Prerequisites ### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms - [x] This is not an ad/bug report; - [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project; - [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes; - [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure. ## What problem does the pull request fix? ### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section - [x] Missed ads or ad leftovers; - [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly; - [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website; - [ ] Missed analytics or tracker; - [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc; - [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc; - [ ] Filters maintenance. ## What issue is being fixed? ### Enter the issue address Fix #127568 ### Add your comment and screenshots #### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located 0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\ Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\ Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content; 1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard Use `
` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler; 2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know. **Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots! 1. Your comment Removed the ad banner 2. Screenshots
Screenshot 1 (Before): ![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/0966d75c2792b8dfad0277ff62aa2ae86a5f43da363021c6b19692d0d511e50d/68747470733a2f2f7265706f7274732d696d672e616467756172642e636f6d2f694d33727669692e706e67)
Screenshot 2 (After):
### Terms - [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met
